channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Aaron Rodgers on Criticism of Steelers HC Mike Tomlin: 'That's an Absolute Joke'
item.description: QB Aaron Rodgers defended head coach Mike Tomlin after the Pittsburgh Steelers lost to the Houston Texans in the wild-card round.

item.title: The Big Picture: Why UConn's Big East Schedule Is High Risk, Low Reward
item.description: FOX Sports' Michael Cohen examines a key Big East matchup: No. 3 UConn vs. No. 25 Seton Hall.

item.title: Last Night in College Basketball: McNeese Grabs Share of Southland Conference Lead
item.description: McNeese had a dominant conference W, Missouri can't shoot its way to Alabama upset, a SWAC shootout, a last-second W for New Orleans and more from Mon...

item.title: Favorite 'Dogs: Back Home Bears Against Rams, Miami to Upset Indiana
item.description: Will Hill is backing the Bears' all-season magic to beat L.A. and the Hurricanes' NFL talent to stimy the Hoosiers.

item.title: Michael Carrick Set to Sign as Manchester United Interim Coach Until Season End
item.description: Michael Carrick was appointed Manchester United interim coach in the wake of Ruben Amorim's departure.

item.title: Can breakout star Leo Carlsson get the Ducks back on track?
item.description: Following a hot start, the Ducks are now on the outside looking in at the playoff race.

item.title: Answering the biggest questions regarding Brooks Koepka's return to the PGA Tour
item.description: How will LIV Golf react? Will other LIV Golf stars follow Koepka back to the PGA Tour? How much will golf fans see Koepka on the PGA Tour this season?

item.title: CFP National Title first look: Previewing Miami-Indiana
item.description: How either Miami or Indiana can win the title, plus X factors for both teams.

item.title: Eight open NFL coaching jobs, eight predicted hires: Who will land in Baltimore, Atlanta, New York?
item.description: Could three coaches who were just fired immediately find new teams? With interviews taking place this week, we projected candidates to fill open jobs.

item.title: How Miami offensive coordinator Shannon Dawson emerged from nowhere
item.description: The architect of the Hurricane offense began his career grinding for a job at Southeastern Louisiana.
